content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

SELECT
    TOP(100) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result];

---- Look for Data Types

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT
    TOP(100) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) AS [result]';

----- Defining Columns and their Data Types

SELECT
    TOP(100) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
    WITH (
       VendorID INT,
       lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),
       lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
       store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
       RatecodeID INT,
       PULocationID INT,
       DOLocationID INT,       
       passenger_count INT,
       trip_distance FLOAT,
       fare_amount FLOAT,
       extra FLOAT,
       mta_tax FLOAT,
       tip_amount FLOAT,
       tolls_amount FLOAT,
       ehail_fee INT,
       improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
       total_amount FLOAT,
       payment_type INT,
       trip_type INT,
       congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    )
    AS [result];


------- Checking data scanned

SELECT
    TOP(100) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
    WITH (
       tip_amount FLOAT,
       trip_type INT
    )
    AS [result];



---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------  ASSIGNMENTS
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

------ 1. Query from folders using wildcard characters

SELECT
    TOP(100) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
    WITH (
       VendorID INT,
       lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),
       lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
       store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
       RatecodeID INT,
       PULocationID INT,
       DOLocationID INT,       
       passenger_count INT,
       trip_distance FLOAT,
       fare_amount FLOAT,
       extra FLOAT,
       mta_tax FLOAT,
       tip_amount FLOAT,
       tolls_amount FLOAT,
       ehail_fee INT,
       improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
       total_amount FLOAT,
       payment_type INT,
       trip_type INT,
       congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    )
    AS [result];

------ 2. Using filename function

SELECT
    [result].filename() As File_name,
    COUNT(1) AS Total_records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
    WITH (
       VendorID INT,
       lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),
       lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
       store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
       RatecodeID INT,
       PULocationID INT,
       DOLocationID INT,       
       passenger_count INT,
       trip_distance FLOAT,
       fare_amount FLOAT,
       extra FLOAT,
       mta_tax FLOAT,
       tip_amount FLOAT,
       tolls_amount FLOAT,
       ehail_fee INT,
       improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
       total_amount FLOAT,
       payment_type INT,
       trip_type INT,
       congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    )
    AS [result]
GROUP BY [result].filename()
ORDER BY [result].filename();

------ 3. Querying from subfolders

SELECT
    TOP(100) *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/**',   --- ** to query subfolders
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
    WITH (
       VendorID INT,
       lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),
       lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
       store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
       RatecodeID INT,
       PULocationID INT,
       DOLocationID INT,       
       passenger_count INT,
       trip_distance FLOAT,
       fare_amount FLOAT,
       extra FLOAT,
       mta_tax FLOAT,
       tip_amount FLOAT,
       tolls_amount FLOAT,
       ehail_fee INT,
       improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
       total_amount FLOAT,
       payment_type INT,
       trip_type INT,
       congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    )
    AS [result]

------ 4. use filepath to select only from certain pertitions

SELECT
    [result].filepath(1) As [year],
    [result].filepath(2) AS [month],
    COUNT(1) AS Total_records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
    WITH (
       VendorID INT,
       lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),
       lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
       store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
       RatecodeID INT,
       PULocationID INT,
       DOLocationID INT,       
       passenger_count INT,
       trip_distance FLOAT,
       fare_amount FLOAT,
       extra FLOAT,
       mta_tax FLOAT,
       tip_amount FLOAT,
       tolls_amount FLOAT,
       ehail_fee INT,
       improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
       total_amount FLOAT,
       payment_type INT,
       trip_type INT,
       congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    )
    AS [result]
WHERE [result].filepath(1) = '2020' AND ([result].filepath(2) BETWEEN '01' AND '04')
GROUP BY [result].filepath(1),[result].filepath(2)
ORDER BY [result].filepath(1),[result].filepath(2);
